title.narrative: West Africa Agricultural Productivity Program APL (WAAPP-1B)

description.narrative: The development objective of WAAPP1-B is to generate and accelerate adoption of improved technologies in the participating countriesâ€™ top agricultural commodity priorities areas that are aligned with the sub-regionâ€™s top agricultural commodity priorities as outlined in the ECOWAP.
